greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n-th sextic factorial number divided by 4.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..345
formula: D-finite with recurrence: a(n) +2*(-3*n+1)*a(n-1)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 28 2020
program: (PARI) vector(20, n, prod(j=1,n, 6*j-2)/4 ) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
(Sage) [product( (6*j-2) for j in (1..n))/4 for n in (1..20)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
(GAP) List([1..20], n-> Product([1..n], j-> 6*j-2)/4 ); # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
